title: Seasons 19 Crop Rotation Planner How To

tasks.task: Using the Crop Rotation Planner in Farming Simulator 19
subtasks: Locate the Crop Rotation Planner for Seasons
Remember the disclaimer about playing on PlayStation 4 without access to Seasons
Acknowledge the reliance on video and method from multiple sources
Start the process by selecting a field to plan (e.g., Field 1)
Check the field's historical crop rotation, noting the previous two years' crops
Note the history into the planner for the current field (Step 1)
Identify the oldest crop (two years prior) and enter it into the first open slot
Enter the previous year's crop (visible stubble) into the next slot (Step 2)
Begin adding planned crops (e.g., for year 1) into the subsequent slots (Step 3)
Consider the percentage chance (1.00 neutral, higher better) for each crop
Update the planner by moving entries up one line each year (Step 5)
Check the impact on previous years' rotations when updating (Step 7)
Duplicate the process for additional fields if needed
Finalize the rotation plan for the first field (if only one is considered)
Explain the non-influence of the planner on the game's mechanics
Express gratitude to viewers and sign off
